channel.title: ShokoMetadata on Shoko
channel.description: Recent content in ShokoMetadata on Shoko

item.title: Announcing a New Plugin - ShokoMetadata
item.description: For the last couple of weeks, Cazzar has been working on a new Plex plugin called, Shoko Metadata. There recently has been the release for version 1.0.0 as this has been deemed the latest stable version working alongside Shoko Server 3.7.0.4. Though at the time of writing, the current version has little documentation due to being an early release. What is it? Firstly, I should get into what this does. Simply put, this plugin for Plex allows you to have the series information for your libraries, as well as tagging derived from the AniDB tags.
